name: Sri Sai Kishan Foundation
briefDescription: OUR "SRI SAI KISHAN FOUNDATION"IS A NGO TO SERVE THE NEEDYPEOPLES AND POOR, TO SOAR THE LIFE OF STUNTED CHILDREN DUE TO MALNUTRITION AND HIV/AIDS AFFECTED CHILDREN'S CARE AND CATERING, GIVE EDUCATIONAL HELPGIVE AWARENESS OF THEIR RESPONSIBILITY IS OUR MISSION !
